Wall_volume
===========

.. table:: Algorithm
   :widths: 15 15 15

   +---------------------------+-----------------------------------+-----------------------------------------+
   | **Algorithm Name**        | **What is this algorithm for?**   | **Description**                         |
   +===========================+===================================+=========================================+
   | wall_volume               | Variables                         | Calculates wall volume.                 |
